children.name: Economic Development
Reduce peak period travel times
Average travel time during AM and PM peak periods on major corridors
Increase transportation investment focusing on economic vitality
Change in employment/economic output in areas with new/improved transportation facilities
Improve reliability of travel to regional activity centers
Planning Time Index (95th percentile travel time / free-flow travel time)
Increase multimodal access to regional activity centers
Percentage of population within ½ mile of transit routes serving activity centers
Reduce freight bottlenecks
Average truck travel time index (TTTI) on freight-priority corridors
Expand and maintain regional network of sidewalks, bike lanes, and trails
Total miles of sidewalks, bike lanes, and multi-use trails regionwide
Equity/Accessibility
Reduce trip lengths with focus on EJ populations
Average trip length by mode and population group (EJ vs. non-EJ)
Increase access to jobs/services via transit, walking, biking for EJ populations
Percentage of EJ population within ½-mile walk of frequent transit service
Number of jobs accessible within 30 minutes by transit/walking/biking (EJ vs. non-EJ)
Safety
Reduce motorized fatalities and serious injuries
Total number of motor vehicle fatalities (annual)
Total number of serious injuries from motor vehicle crashes
Fatality rate per 100 million VMT
Serious injury rate per 100 million VMT
Reduce non-motorized fatalities and serious injuries
Non-motorized fatality/serious injury rate per capita or per 100,000 population
System Management
Improve condition of all bridges
Percentage of NHS bridges (by deck area) in good condition
Percentage of NHS bridges (by deck area) in poor condition
Improve lane miles of pavements in good/poor condition
Percentage of Interstate lane miles in good condition
Percentage of Interstate lane miles in poor condition
Improve percent of transit vehicles/facilities in good/poor condition
Percentage of transit revenue vehicles exceeding useful life benchmark
Percentage of non-revenue vehicles exceeding useful life benchmark
Percentage of facilities rated below 3.0 on FTA's TERM scale
Environment
Reduce transportation-related pollutants
Total tons of transportation-related emissions per year (CO₂, NOₓ, VOCs, PM2.5)
Emissions per capita or per vehicle mile traveled (VMT)
Reduce impact on environmentally sensitive areas
Acres of environmentally sensitive land impacted by transportation projects
